11.content: which Crystal Gem
11.title: A crystal Gem (Pearl, Amethyst, Garnet, Lapis, ...

142.content:
"YELLOW!" A cheery voice called out, breaking the conqueror's concentration.

"What are you doing Yellow?" The owner of the voice asked, popping up by Yellow's workstation.

Not for the first time, Yellow decided to just roll with her little sister's presence, "I'm trying to focus my powers on reshaping a Gem's physical form." The larger Diamond explained as she fiddled with a mannequin-like figure.

"Can I try?" Pink smiled only to be picked up and put on the floor, a wand like device crackling with Yellow's power being placed in her hands. "Here. Go play with this and I'll play with you later."

With a pout, Pink walked back to her room, regarding the wand. "How is this supposed to change a Gem's form?" She asked, thumbing the buttons. Pointing it at her free hand, she was shocked to see the energy making it several times bigger. "Cool." She smiled before she focused the wand's power to make her as tall as Yellow and Blue. "This is so amazing!"

Regarding the now much too small for her wand in her right hand, Pink tried to return herself to her usual size. Untrained at doing anything at her new size, she unknowingly set the controls at too high a level of sensitivity.

In a flash of yellow light, Pink Diamond became the smallest of the Diamonds once again, winding up an inch tall as the now powerless device clattered to the ground.

"Ok. Not good." Pink said as she checked herself over. "Oh I'm gonna have to ask Yellow for help aren't I?"

Swallowing her pride, the pink Gem began running back to her door, taking over a minute to get across the room, only to find that her door didn't open at her small size.

"It must think I'm a Pebble." She rationalized.

Crouching down, Pink tried to squeeze under her door only for her hips to wind up stuck, her legs flailing uselessly as she tried to squirm to freedom. "Come on. Come on."

So focused was she on her task however that she failed to notice someone approaching and her door opening.

Sent flying back and skidding on her rear, Pink looked up to see the massive form of __
142.title: Pink
